search.query: search $frameID$ $host$ | timechart useother=t limit=10 count by host
search $frameID$ $host$ | stats max(latest_cpu_load_percent) AS latest_cpu_load_percent by host | sort - latest_cpu_load_percent
search $frameID$ $host$ | stats max(latest_cpu_load_percent) AS latest_cpu_load_percent by host | sort - latest_cpu_load_percent

html.p: No hosts with CPU alerts were reported over last 24 hours
